00048 static int mgs_fs_seq_show(struct seq_file *seq, void *v)
00049 {
00050         struct obd_device       *obd = seq->private;
00051         struct mgs_device       *mgs;
00052         struct list_head         list;
00053         struct mgs_direntry     *dirent, *n;
00054         struct lu_env            env;
00055         int rc, len;
00056 
00057         ENTRY;
00058 
00059         LASSERT(obd != NULL);
00060         LASSERT(obd->obd_lu_dev != NULL);
00061         mgs = lu2mgs_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00062 
00063         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_MG_THREAD);
00064         if (rc)
00065                 RETURN(rc);
00066 
00067         rc = class_dentry_readdir(&env, mgs, &list);
00068         if (rc)
00069                 GOTO(out, rc);
00070 
00071         list_for_each_entry_safe(dirent, n, &list, mde_list) {
00072                 list_del_init(&dirent->mde_list);
00073                 len = strlen(dirent->mde_name);
00074                 if (len > 7 &&
00075                     strncmp(dirent->mde_name + len - 7, "-client", len) == 0)
00076                         seq_printf(seq, "%.*s\n", len - 7, dirent->mde_name);
00077                 mgs_direntry_free(dirent);
00078         }
00079 
00080 out:
00081         lu_env_fini(&env);
00082         RETURN(0);
00083 }
00084 
00085 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(mgs_fs);
00086 
00087 static void seq_show_srpc_rules(struct seq_file *seq, const char *tgtname,
00088                                 struct sptlrpc_rule_set *rset)
00089 {
00090         struct sptlrpc_rule    *r;
00091         char                    dirbuf[10];
00092         char                    flvrbuf[40];
00093         char                    net[LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE] = "default";
00094         int                     i;
00095 
00096         for (i = 0; i < rset->srs_nrule; i++) {
00097                 r = &rset->srs_rules[i];
00098 
00099                 if (r->sr_netid != LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY))
00100                         libcfs_net2str_r(r->sr_netid, net, sizeof(net));
00101 
00102                 if (r->sr_from == LUSTRE_SP_ANY && r->sr_to == LUSTRE_SP_ANY)
00103                         dirbuf[0] = '\0';
00104                 else
00105                         snprintf(dirbuf, sizeof(dirbuf), ".%s2%s",
00106                                  sptlrpc_part2name(r->sr_from),
00107                                  sptlrpc_part2name(r->sr_to));
00108 
00109                 sptlrpc_flavor2name(&r->sr_flvr, flvrbuf, sizeof(flvrbuf));
00110                 seq_printf(seq, "%s.srpc.flavor.%s%s=%s\n", tgtname,
00111                            net, dirbuf, flvrbuf);
00112         }
00113 }
00114 
00115 static int mgsself_srpc_seq_show(struct seq_file *seq, void *v)
00116 {
00117         struct obd_device       *obd = seq->private;
00118         struct mgs_device       *mgs = lu2mgs_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00119         struct lu_target        *tgt = &mgs->mgs_lut;
00120 
00121         read_lock(&tgt->lut_sptlrpc_lock);
00122         seq_show_srpc_rules(seq, MGSSELF_NAME, &tgt->lut_sptlrpc_rset);
00123         read_unlock(&tgt->lut_sptlrpc_lock);
00124 
00125         return 0;
00126 }
00127 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(mgsself_srpc);
00128 
00129 static int mgs_live_seq_show(struct seq_file *seq, void *v)
00130 {
00131         struct fs_db             *fsdb = seq->private;
00132         struct mgs_tgt_srpc_conf *srpc_tgt;
00133         int i;
00134 
00135         mutex_lock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
00136 
00137         seq_printf(seq, "fsname: %s\n", fsdb->fsdb_name);
00138         seq_printf(seq, "flags: %#lx     gen: %d\n",
00139                    fsdb->fsdb_flags, fsdb->fsdb_gen);
00140         for (i = 0; i < INDEX_MAP_SIZE * 8; i++)
00141                 if (test_bit(i, fsdb->fsdb_mdt_index_map))
00142                          seq_printf(seq, "%s-MDT%04x\n", fsdb->fsdb_name, i);
00143         for (i = 0; i < INDEX_MAP_SIZE * 8; i++)
00144                 if (test_bit(i, fsdb->fsdb_ost_index_map))
00145                          seq_printf(seq, "%s-OST%04x\n", fsdb->fsdb_name, i);
00146 
00147         seq_printf(seq, "\nSecure RPC Config Rules:\n");
00148 #if 0
00149         seq_printf(seq, "%s.%s=%s\n", fsdb->fsdb_name,
00150                    PARAM_SRPC_UDESC, fsdb->fsdb_srpc_fl_udesc ? "yes" : "no");
00151 #endif
00152         for (srpc_tgt = fsdb->fsdb_srpc_tgt; srpc_tgt;
00153              srpc_tgt = srpc_tgt->mtsc_next) {
00154                 seq_show_srpc_rules(seq, srpc_tgt->mtsc_tgt,
00155                                     &srpc_tgt->mtsc_rset);
00156         }
00157         seq_show_srpc_rules(seq, fsdb->fsdb_name, &fsdb->fsdb_srpc_gen);
00158 
00159         lprocfs_rd_ir_state(seq, fsdb);
00160 
00161         mutex_unlock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
00162         return 0;
00163 }
00164 
00165 static ssize_t mgs_live_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buf,
00166                                   size_t len, loff_t *off)
00167 {
00168         struct seq_file *seq  = file->private_data;
00169         struct fs_db    *fsdb = seq->private;
00170         ssize_t rc;
00171 
00172         rc = lprocfs_wr_ir_state(file, buf, len, fsdb);
00173         if (rc >= 0)
00174                 rc = len;
00175         return rc;
00176 }
00177 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mgs_live);
00178 
00179 int lproc_mgs_add_live(struct mgs_device *mgs, struct fs_db *fsdb)
00180 {
00181         int rc;
00182 
00183         if (!mgs->mgs_proc_live)
00184                 return 0;
00185         rc = lprocfs_seq_create(mgs->mgs_proc_live, fsdb->fsdb_name, 0644,
00186                                 &mgs_live_fops, fsdb);
00187 
00188         return 0;
00189 }
00190 
00191 int lproc_mgs_del_live(struct mgs_device *mgs, struct fs_db *fsdb)
00192 {
00193         if (!mgs->mgs_proc_live)
00194                 return 0;
00195 
00196         /* didn't create the proc file for MGSSELF_NAME */
00197         if (!test_bit(FSDB_MGS_SELF, &fsdb->fsdb_flags))
00198                 lprocfs_remove_proc_entry(fsdb->fsdb_name, mgs->mgs_proc_live);
00199         return 0;
00200 }
00201 
00202 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(mgs, uuid);
00203 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(mgs, num_exports);
00204 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(mgs, hash);
00205 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_WO_TYPE(mgs, evict_client);
00206 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RW_TYPE(mgs, ir_timeout);
00207 
00208 static struct lprocfs_vars lprocfs_mgs_obd_vars[] = {
00209         { .name =       "uuid",
00210           .fops =       &mgs_uuid_fops          },
00211         { .name =       "num_exports",
00212           .fops =       &mgs_num_exports_fops   },
00213         { .name =       "hash_stats",
00214           .fops =       &mgs_hash_fops          },
00215         { .name =       "evict_client",
00216           .fops =       &mgs_evict_client_fops  },
00217         { .name =       "ir_timeout",
00218           .fops =       &mgs_ir_timeout_fops    },
00219         { NULL }
00220 };
00221 
00222 int lproc_mgs_setup(struct mgs_device *mgs, const char *osd_name)
00223 {
00224         struct obd_device *obd = mgs->mgs_obd;
00225         struct obd_device *osd_obd = mgs->mgs_bottom->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd;
00226         int                osd_len = strlen(osd_name) - strlen("-osd");
00227         int                rc;
00228 
00229         obd->obd_vars = lprocfs_mgs_obd_vars;
00230         rc = lprocfs_obd_setup(obd);
00231         if (rc != 0)
00232                 GOTO(out, rc);
00233 
00234         rc = lprocfs_obd_seq_create(obd, "filesystems", 0444,
00235                                     &mgs_fs_fops, obd);
00236         if (rc != 0)
00237                 GOTO(out, rc);
00238 
00239         rc = lprocfs_obd_seq_create(obd, "srpc_rules", 0400,
00240                                     &mgsself_srpc_fops, obd);
00241         if (rc != 0)
00242                 GOTO(out, rc);
00243 
00244         mgs->mgs_proc_live = lprocfs_register("live", obd->obd_proc_entry,
00245                                               NULL, NULL);
00246         if (IS_ERR(mgs->mgs_proc_live)) {
00247                 rc = PTR_ERR(mgs->mgs_proc_live);
00248                 mgs->mgs_proc_live = NULL;
00249                 GOTO(out, rc);
00250         }
00251 
00252         obd->obd_proc_exports_entry = lprocfs_register("exports",
00253                                                        obd->obd_proc_entry,
00254                                                        NULL, NULL);
00255         if (IS_ERR(obd->obd_proc_exports_entry)) {
00256                 rc = PTR_ERR(obd->obd_proc_exports_entry);
00257                 obd->obd_proc_exports_entry = NULL;
00258                 GOTO(out, rc);
00259         }
00260 
00261         mgs->mgs_proc_osd = lprocfs_add_symlink("osd",
00262                                                 obd->obd_proc_entry,
00263                                                 "../../%s/%.*s",
00264                                                 osd_obd->obd_type->typ_name,
00265                                                 osd_len, /* Strip "-osd". */
00266                                                 osd_name);
00267         if (mgs->mgs_proc_osd == NULL)
00268                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00269 
00270         mgs->mgs_proc_mntdev = lprocfs_add_symlink("mntdev",
00271                                                    obd->obd_proc_entry,
00272                                                    "osd/mntdev");
00273         if (mgs->mgs_proc_mntdev == NULL)
00274                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00275 
00276         mgs->mgs_proc_fstype = lprocfs_add_symlink("fstype",
00277                                                    obd->obd_proc_entry,
00278                                                    "osd/fstype");
00279         if (mgs->mgs_proc_fstype == NULL)
00280                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00281 
00282 out:
00283         if (rc != 0)
00284                 lproc_mgs_cleanup(mgs);
00285 
00286         return rc;
00287 }
00288 
00289 void lproc_mgs_cleanup(struct mgs_device *mgs)
00290 {
00291         struct obd_device *obd = mgs->mgs_obd;
00292 
00293         if (obd == NULL)
00294                 return;
00295 
00296         if (mgs->mgs_proc_osd != NULL)
00297                 lprocfs_remove(&mgs->mgs_proc_osd);
00298 
00299         if (mgs->mgs_proc_fstype != NULL)
00300                 lprocfs_remove(&mgs->mgs_proc_fstype);
00301 
00302         if (mgs->mgs_proc_mntdev != NULL)
00303                 lprocfs_remove(&mgs->mgs_proc_mntdev);
00304 
00305         if (mgs->mgs_proc_live != NULL) {
00306                 /* Should be no live entries */
00307                 lprocfs_remove(&mgs->mgs_proc_live);
00308                 mgs->mgs_proc_live = NULL;
00309         }
00310 
00311         lprocfs_free_per_client_stats(obd);
00312         lprocfs_obd_cleanup(obd);
00313         lprocfs_free_obd_stats(obd);
00314         lprocfs_free_md_stats(obd);
00315 }
00316 
00317 void mgs_counter_incr(struct obd_export *exp, int opcode)
00318 {
00319         lprocfs_counter_incr(exp->exp_obd->obd_stats, opcode);
00320         if (exp->exp_nid_stats && exp->exp_nid_stats->nid_stats != NULL)
00321                 lprocfs_counter_incr(exp->exp_nid_stats->nid_stats, opcode);
00322 }
00323 
00324 void mgs_stats_counter_init(struct lprocfs_stats *stats)
00325 {
00326         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MGS_CONNECT, 0, "connect", "reqs");
00327         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MGS_DISCONNECT, 0, "disconnect",
00328                              "reqs");
00329         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MGS_EXCEPTION, 0, "exception",
00330                              "reqs");
00331         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MGS_TARGET_REG, 0, "tgtreg", "reqs");
00332         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MGS_TARGET_DEL, 0, "tgtdel", "reqs");
00333 }
